name: B. Powers of Two
statement:
You are given integers . Find the number of pairs of indexes () that is
a power of (i. e. some integer exists so that ).
editorial:
To solve this problem we need to use map and store in this map how many
times every integer appears in the given array. Then we need to iterate
through all given numbers with variable . Let the current number is
equal to . For this number we need to iterate on all possible powers of
2 (the number of these powers is no more than 31). Let the current power
is equal to . Then we need to make and add the value to the asnwer.
